Title: Safe House
Writer: Joseph Weisberg (creator), Joshua Brand, Sneha Koorse (staff writer), Mike Batistick (staff writer)

Plot: Phillip and Elizabeth shock their children when they announce they are separating. After Amador goes missing, Gaad orders an unauthorized mission to grab a KGB agent in retaliation. Events soon spin out of control and come to a grisly end.
